definition: popular science/popularization of science/abbr. of 科學普及|科学普及
branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]
the Copts, major ethnoreligious group of Egyptian Christians
Coptic, Afro-Asiatic language of the Copts 科普特人[Ke1 pu3 te4 ren2], spoken in Egypt until late 17th century

sentences.english: The Boskops coexisted with our Homo sapiens forebears.
sentences.chinese: 博斯科普人曾与我们的智人祖先和平共处。

sentences.english: A popular science web about fossils and nature history, and museums.
sentences.chinese: 有关化石和自然历史的科普及博物馆网站。

sentences.english: Books on popular science are selling well.
The national government and parliament are based in Skopje, Macedonia's capital.
sentences.chinese: 斯科普里，马其顿首都，该国政府和国会都位于此。

sentences.english: Don't go for a usual all things tech blog.
sentences.chinese: 别把博客变成一本科普书。

sentences.english: Reading more scientific books is good for children.
sentences.chinese: 多读一些科普书对儿童有好处。

sentences.english: Citizens have the right to participate in PST activities.
sentences.chinese: 公民有参与科普活动的权利。

sentences.english: Activity site also distributed ten thousand copies of popular science books and promotional materials.
sentences.chinese: 活动现场还发放了近万份科普读物和宣传材料。

sentences.english: What science book recommendations do you have for nonscientists?
sentences.chinese: 您会向非科学家读者推荐哪些科普书？

sentences.english: These pupils have read a good many books on popular science.
sentences.chinese: 这些小学生读了很多科普方面的书。

sentences.english: I was raised in a neighborhood where my neighbors were Copts.
sentences.chinese: 我从小长大的地方，邻居都是科普特人。

sentences.english: Skopje, Macedonia: Storks mate at sunset in Petrovec village.
sentences.chinese: 马其顿斯科普里，在夕阳下交配的鹳。

sentences.english: Participated in the preparation of clinical academic science focus 4.
sentences.chinese: 参加编写临床学术科普专注4部。

sentences.english: Still this book, his first for a non-specialist audience, is a profound one.
sentences.chinese: 但作为他的第一本科普著作，这本书仍然全面而深奥。

sentences.english: The national capital, Skopje, has been most affected by the outbreak.
sentences.chinese: 首都斯科普里是受疫情影响最严重的地区。

sentences.english: Is it a popular science reading?
